title: IT Recruiter
job_description:
Job Description
   Job title : IT Recruiter 
   Job Location : Belapur (Navi Mumbai) 
   Job Type : Full-time 
   Company Name : Chabeztech Pvt Ltd 
   About Us : 
   ChabezTech is a fast growing IT Staffing & Software development solution firm providing services in IT Services & Technology industry. ChabezTech is headquartered in Pennsylvania with office in India based in Mumbai and Pune with a client base all around the world. ChabezTech provide a wide variety of IT Staffing & Software development solution. We have an offshore hub for back end operations and support for clients all over the world. 
   Company Website : https://chabeztech.com/ 
   Role 
   Manage the entire life cycle of the recruitment process for clients in the Indian Market. 
   Summary 
   Work closely with the Recruiting leads and hiring managers. 
   Work on strategic global hiring programs. 
   Develop an action plan for recruiting the best fit for the organization. 
   Procure people for different IT Requirements. 
   Use niche platforms related to IT, to source potential candidates. 
   Personally conduct interviews, document the same, and report as the need arises. 
   In addition to executing individual responsibility should be able to work in unison with the other departments with the Company’s growth perspective in mind. 
   Keeping abreast of the industry trends. 
  
   Requirements 
   Minimum experience of 1 year in IT Recruitment 
   Good verbal and Written Communication 
 
  
  
 
 Additional Information
   All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.

title: Network Engineer
job_description:
Job Summary: 
        
       
       
         
         
         Job Summary  
          
          
           Good Knowledge on Networking Layers & OSI layers. 
           
          
           Good knowledge on GPON Technology.- Fibre Optic 
           
          
           Working and Troubleshooting on routing protocols like EIGRP, LACP & Static route 
           
          
           Configuration of VLANs, RSTP, MSTP, IGMP, SNMP 
           
          
           Work in tandem with L2 / L3 to resolve escalated issues 
           
          
           Hands on experience on CISCO, Juniper switches 
           
          
           Online support to client 
           
          
           Visit to client 
           
          
           Ready to travel PAN India. 
          
         
        
       
        
        
       
     
     
     
      
       
        
         Key Duties/Responsibilities: 
        
       
       
       
        
          
          
          
           
            
             Responsibilities 
             
            
             % of Time Spent

             60 % 
            
           
            
            
            
             Implementation:  
              
              
               Visiting customer site and understanding customer requirement and configuring the devices.

             30% 
            
           
            
            
            
             Managerial:

             10%

              Good communication skills  
              Energetic & self-motivated & team player.  
              Goal achievers & positive thinking. 
             
            
             
           
            
           
            
             Functional:  
              
              CCNA certified.  
              Diploma in Hardware 
             
              
             
           
            
           
            
             
              Language Known: English, Hindi, Marathi 
             
              
             
           
            
           
            
             
              Travel Requirements: 70% from office and 30% from feid. 
             
              
             
           
            
          
         
         Click on 'Apply Now' Button or you can send an email with your Resume to hr@optilinknetwork.com

title: Embedded Developer & Tech Support
job_description:
Job Vacancy: Embedded Developer & Tech Support 
 About Us: DreamVertex is a pioneering technology company dedicated to creating cutting-edge electronic solutions for various industries. Our commitment to innovation and excellence drives us to deliver top-notch products and services to our clients. We are currently seeking a versatile and motivated individual to join our team as an Embedded Developer & Tech Support professional. 
 Role Overview: As an Embedded Developer & Tech Support atDreamVertex, you will play a pivotal role in both the development of electronic projects and providing exceptional technical support to our clients. This hybrid role offers a unique opportunity to contribute to project design, development, and testing, while also engaging directly with clients to provide technical assistance and presentations. 
 Key Responsibilities: 
 
  Collaborate with the development team to assist in the design and development of electronic projects, including embedded systems and devices. 
  Participate in the testing and validation of electronic components and systems to ensure functionality and quality. 
  Provide comprehensive tech support to clients, addressing their inquiries and troubleshooting any issues that arise. 
  Deliver engaging presentations to clients, showcasing the features, benefits, and technical aspects of our products and solutions. 
  Prepare and organize presentation materials, technical documentation, and other resources for client meetings. 
 
 Qualifications: 
 
  diploma in Electronics Engineering, electronics & communication, person willing to work in electronic domain should only applu. 
  basic knowledge in embedded systems development and programming languages such as C/C++. 
  Basic understanding of electronic components, microcontrollers, and hardware-software interaction. 
  Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to diagnose and resolve technical issues effectively. 
  Exceptional communication skills, both written and verbal, for client interactions and presentations. 
 
 Job Types: Full-time, Fresher 
 Salary: From ₹6,000.00 per month 
 Schedule: 
 
  Day shift 
 
 Ability to commute/relocate: 
 
  Panvel, Maharashtra: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required) 
 
 Education: 
 
  Diploma (Preferred) 
 
 Experience: 
 
  Technical support: 1 year (Preferred) 
  total work: 1 year (Preferred) 
 
 Speak with the employer +91 9930703546

title: IT Automation Testing
job_description:
About GRT Global Logistics: 
 GRT Global Logistics Pvt. Ltd. – Leading International Freight Forwarder, Consolidator and Logistics company (grtship.com) 
 GRT Global Logistics is one of the leading international freight forwarder and logistics service provider based in Mumbai. GRT is a systems centric and process driven company focused on creating value for its employees, investors, customers and other stake holders. GRT is in advanced stages of developing a world class ERP solution to manage sales, operations, CRM, accounts, finance and other functions for the logistics and freight forwarding industry. 
 Job Description: 
 We are seeking a diligent and detail-oriented Software Tester to join our dynamic team. As a Software Tester, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the quality and reliability of our software products through comprehensive testing and analysis. Your responsibilities will include developing test plans, executing test cases, identifying and documenting defects, and collaborating with the development team to ensure timely issue resolution. Your expertise and commitment to quality will contribute to the successful delivery of high-performance software solutions to our clients. 
 Responsibilities: 
 ● Develop test plans, test scenarios, and test cases based on project requirements and design specifications. 
 ● Execute automated tests to verify software functionality, performance, usability, and security. 
 ● Identify, document, and prioritize software defects, bugs, and issues using a defect tracking system. 
 ● Collaborate with the development team to understand software requirements, design intent, and technical specifications. 
 ● Conduct thorough regression testing to ensure that software modifications and enhancements do not adversely affect existing functionality. 
 ● Perform compatibility testing across different platforms, operating systems, and browsers. 
 ● Participate in design and requirement review meetings to provide input on testability and quality aspects. 
 ● Analyze and troubleshoot software issues, investigating and communicating their root causes to the development team. 
 ● Work closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, business analysts, and project managers, to ensure effective communication and collaboration throughout the testing process. 
 ● Continuously enhance testing processes and methodologies to improve efficiency, accuracy, and effectiveness. 
 ● Stay updated with industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in software testing. 
 Requirements: 
 ● Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience). 
 ● Proven experience as a Software Tester or in a similar role. 
 ● Strong understanding of software development life cycle (SDLC) and software testing principles. 
 ● Strong programming skills: Proficiency in one or more programming languages such as Java, Python, C#, or JavaScript is essential for writing and maintaining test automation scripts. 
 ● Experience with automation testing tools: Familiarity with popular automation testing frameworks and tools such as Selenium WebDriver, Appium, Cucumber, JUnit, TestNG, or similar tools is necessary. 
 ● Knowledge of test automation frameworks: Understanding and experience with test automation frameworks, such as Keyword-driven, Data-driven, or Behavior-driven development (BDD), can be advantageous. 
 ● Scripting and automation experience: Ability to write and execute automation scripts for web applications, APIs, or mobile applications using appropriate tools and frameworks. 
 ● Test data management: Ability to create and maintain test data sets and databases for automated testing. 
 ● Performance testing: Familiarity with performance testing tools like JMeter or LoadRunner to conduct load, stress, and performance testing is a plus. 
 ● Agile methodologies: Experience working in an Agile development environment and understanding of Agile principles and practices. 
 ● API testing: Knowledge of API testing tools such as Postman, SoapUI, or REST Assured, and experience in testing web services, RESTful APIs, or microservices. 
 ● Test automation best practices: Understanding of best practices for test automation, including test script design, maintainability, scalability, and test data management. 
 ● Troubleshooting and debugging skills: Proficiency in identifying and resolving issues with test automation scripts and environments. 
 ● Strong problem-solving skills: Ability to analyze complex scenarios and troubleshoot issues encountered during test automation. 
 ● Self-motivated and proactive: Willingness to learn new tools, technologies, and frameworks independently and stay updated with industry trends in test automation. 
 Office Location: Saki Naka, Andheri (E) 
 Job Type: Full-time 
 Salary: ₹200,000.00 - ₹300,000.00 per year 
 Schedule: 
 
  Day shift 
 
 Ability to commute/relocate: 
 
  Sakinaka, Andheri East, Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required) 
 
 Education: 
 
  Bachelor's (Required) 
 
 Speak with the employer +91 8850336448
